title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: ader, and George [Home] of Kimmerghame,  conjunctly and severally, their heirs, executors, and successors, to the deceast Mr. Richard Thomson, minister at Inneresk, and John Duncan, then Kirk Thesaurer, and their successors in office, in name of the Session, and for the use and behove of the poor of the parish of Mussleburgh, covering annualrent from date, viz. 2.
